title: California sues Trump administration over Census citizenship question
text:
California sues Trump administration over Census citizenship question Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:01 
California Attorney General Xavier Becerra asked the U.S. District Court in the Northern District of California to issue a preliminary injunction and rule that the Trump administration's move to add a citizenship status question on the 2020 Census violates the constitution by interfering with the obligation to conduct a full count of the U.S. population. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
California Attorney General Xavier Becerra asked the U.S. District Court in the Northern District of California to issue a preliminary injunction and rule that the Trump administration's move to add a citizenship status question on the 2020 Census violates the constitution by interfering with the obligation to conduct a full count of the U.S. population.
